text:
It would be nice to be able to give properties a description like targets and 
tasks.
E.G.
<property name="native.libraries" value="libs" description="location of native 
libraries"/>

so

ant -projecthelp
Main properties:   
 native.libraries  location of native libraries

creator: jan@materne.de

text:
you can't print out all of ants properties without successfully executing every
path of the build. So printing them out doesnt work. Better to add a meaningful
<description> at the beginning of a project.
creator: stevel@apache.org
